data.name: ENDOTRACHEAL TUBES
data.description:
## COMPOSITION
- 100% PVC, 100% DEHP-FREE PVC and 100% Silicone

## STERILIZATION
- Ethylene Oxide (EO) Sterile

## PRESENTATIONS
- Color-Coded Size Identification
- Standard and Atraumatic Eyes Tips
- PVC, DEHP-FREE PVC and Silicone
- Cuffed and Uncuffed

## PERFORMANCE
- Outstanding balance between softness and flexibility
- Anatomic Tip allowing successful introduction
- Murphy Eye
- High Seal pressure balloon
- Encapsulated radiopaque stripe all along the tube length
- Clear Tube
